name: bug-fix
title: Bug Fix
description: Template for documenting and fixing bugs with proper testing

variables.name: bug_description
variables.example: Users cannot tap the login button on mobile devices, it doesn't respond to touch events

variables.name: expected_behavior
variables.example: Login button should respond to tap and submit the form

variables.name: actual_behavior
variables.example: Nothing happens when tapping the button

content:
# Bug Fix: {{bug_title}}

## Bug Report

### Description
{{bug_description}}

### Expected Behavior
{{expected_behavior}}

### Actual Behavior
{{actual_behavior}}

### Affected Area
{{affected_area}}

### Priority
{{priority}}

## Requirements

### Investigation
- Identify root cause of the bug
- Document findings in code comments or issue

### Fix
- Implement minimal fix that addresses root cause
- Avoid changing unrelated code
- Follow existing code patterns

### Testing
- Add regression test to prevent recurrence
- Verify fix works in affected scenarios
- Test edge cases

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Root cause identified and documented
- [ ] Bug is fixed
- [ ] Fix follows existing code patterns
- [ ] Regression test added
- [ ] No new bugs introduced
- [ ] Fix verified in development environment

## Out of Scope
- Feature enhancements
- Refactoring unrelated code
- Performance optimizations (unless causing the bug)
